channel.title: Effort on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Effort on Simba Tango

item.title: The illusion of effortlessness requires a great effort indeed
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ mjzitek Elegance. You know it when you see it, but it can be hard to point your finger at exactly what it is that makes a couple elegant. Effortlessness. Natural movement. Simple, clean and concise. No wasted energy. It doesn’t come easy.
